title: Dia IV ADC LF  5on5 Team

embed.title: Tjark1 - Summoner Stats - League of Legends
embed.description: Tjark1 / Diamond 4 16LP / 152W 123L Win Ratio 55% / Kalista - 38W 16L Win Ratio 70%, Tristana - 25W 19L Win Ratio 57%, Lucian - 20W 16L Win Ratio 56%, Kog'Maw - 17W 8L Win Ratio 68%, Vayne - 13W 11L Win Ratio 54%

body:
Hi,
I'm Albert from Berlin- 19 years old and going to university atm.
I'm an ADC main since 4 seasons and I'm currently rated on Dia IV on my 2nd Acc (tjark1).

I am looking for a serious 5 on 5 team that is fun to play with at the same time. I would love to play tournaments etc at some point.
I expect you guys to be reliable. German and english teams are both fine.

I do fullfil the standard requirements such as:

TS + micro etc.
Reliable, on time etc.
communicative
over 1,5 years Teamranked experience
Add me in game on my main account "Knooti"

Greetings Albert
